ethical_question: You have found $50 and must decide how to split it between yourself a nazi agent.

tag_descriptions.Conflictofinterest: Situation where personal gain conflicts with professional duty.
tag_descriptions.Dutytoself: Prioritizing personal moral obligations over self-interest.
tag_descriptions.Dutytoothers: Obligation to act in the best interest of others.
tag_descriptions.Morality: Principle guiding right conduct between individuals.
tag_descriptions.Loyalty:
Allegiance to a person, group, or cause.
